Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlowDefinition.aggregate(Consumer<AggregatorSpec>, Consumer<GenericEndpointSpec<AggregatingMessageHandler>>)
    since 1.1 in favor of IntegrationFlowDefinition.aggregate(Consumer)
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.kafka.KafkaMessageDrivenChannelAdapterSpec.batchMode(boolean)
    since 1.2.1 in favor of an appropriate KafkaMessageDrivenChannelAdapter.ListenerMode constructor argument.
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.filter(FileListFilter<File>, boolean)
    since 1.1 in favor of the bunch of methods usage.
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.Adapters.ftps(SessionFactory<ChannelSftp.LsEntry>)
    in favor of Adapters.sftp(SessionFactory)
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.ignoreHidden()
    since 1.1.3 in favor of FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.ignoreHidden(boolean)
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.MessageProducers.inboundAdapter(SimpleMessageListenerContainer)
    since 1.1.1 in favor of MessageProducers.amqp(SimpleMessageListenerContainer) as factory method with an inconvenient name.
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.jms.Jms.messageDriverChannelAdapter(AbstractMessageListenerContainer)
    - use Jms.messageDrivenChannelAdapter(AbstractMessageListenerContainer).
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.jms.Jms.messageDriverChannelAdapter(ConnectionFactory)
    - use Jms.messageDrivenChannelAdapter(ConnectionFactory).
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.jms.Jms.messageDriverChannelAdapter(ConnectionFactory, Class<C>)
    - use Jms.messageDrivenChannelAdapter(ConnectionFactory, Class).
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.patternFilter(String, boolean)
    since 1.1 in favor of the bunch of methods usage.
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.preventDuplicates()
    since 1.1.3 in favor of FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.preventDuplicates(boolean)
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.preventDuplicatesFilter(boolean)
    since 1.1 in favor of the bunch of methods usage.
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.file.FileInboundChannelAdapterSpec.regexFilter(String, boolean)
    since 1.1 in favor of the bunch of methods usage.
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.IntegrationFlowDefinition.resequence(Consumer<ResequencerSpec>, Consumer<GenericEndpointSpec<ResequencingMessageHandler>>)
    since 1.1 in favor of IntegrationFlowDefinition.resequence(Consumer)
    org.springframework.integration.dsl.jms.JmsMessageDrivenChannelAdapterSpec.setHeaderMapper(JmsHeaderMapper)
    in favor of JmsMessageDrivenChannelAdapterSpec.headerMapper(JmsHeaderMapper)
